text: 🚨Privatization Warning! 🚨Did you know that private-sector ER care is 21% more expensive than VHA care? 💸💥 And each follow-up service generates more revenue for VCCP providers without the normal insurance company utilization review. 🤑📈But that's not all! VHA providers undergo extensive training to better understand and treat veteran-specific mental and physical problems. 💪🏼🧠Let's not forget the Obama-era panel, stacked with privatization fans like Darin Selnick, who dissented from the final report because it didn't go far enough in his favored direction. 🤔💭The real question is: do we really want to lose our only model of comprehensive health care? 🤷‍♀️👀#PrivatizationWarning
